# pkg-config .pc file generated by CMake 3.31.6 for bson-2.1.2. DO NOT EDIT!
prefix=%INSTALL_PLACEHOLDER%
exec_prefix=${prefix}
libdir=${exec_prefix}/lib

Name: bson
Description: The libbson BSON serialization library
Version: 2.1.2

Libs: -L${libdir} -lbson2 -L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu -lrt
Cflags:  -I${prefix}/include/bson-2.1.2
